name: Arnold the Amoeba: Invasion Earth
description:
Can you fend off Arnold's waves of invading amoebas?

The Earth needs a saviour! Are you the right person for the job? How many Amoebas can you kill?

The Android version contains 2 builds 1 for Arm7 & 1 for Arm64

You can choose from any of the 4 builds, You will get the Android versions bundled as extras for free in the Windows/Linux & Mac builds.

Main Coding by Cedarwood Software

CedarwoodSoftware@outlook.com

Art Work by Marko Janjic

jaanjicm@gmail.com

Music by Jeremy Blake
